og.description: VideoIn the 1996 Halloween episode of The Simpsons, space aliens and siblings Kodos and Kang, as part of their relentless quest to conquer Earth, abduct presidential candidates Bill Clinton and Bob Dole. The pair then use advanced technology to bio-duplicate the forms of Clinton and Dole and take their places in the election process, guaranteeing that [...]
